page.title: 04Sasha's Day.
page.content: At about 8.55am I fly into the car and hoot at my mum.She leaves the house and we rev down the school.When I get there I jump out of the car and run to my classroom.I hang my coat and bag up {and get out my spelling book and start {writing out spellings for the week.On {Mondays we have assembly (Wednsday is {the only day we don't have assembly). {When we come back we start the days mathematics .It is usually about 12.00pm when we have finished the first page .We go into the playground and wait to be told when we can go to lunch.We usually muck about.We go {into the playground for the last 20 {minutes.Then we come in for a half {hour of almost silent reading. In the {afternoon we watch a "How We Used To {Live" programme and write something {about it then we put our chairs up. { }
